name: Tornillo Factory
description:
“It’s a game that will attract lots of players. In a genre that lately has been abandoned without many news, they needed and desired another refreshing title; Tornillo Factory is a platform game with robots, in a pintoresque futuristic world of desolation where the fight for freedom is arduous and deadly.”

Tornillo Factory is a platform game with 2D mechanics set in a 3D world space. The player is a robot, Tornillo, who has to survive and advance through a big factory filled with traps and enemies with the final goal to discover who he is and what is his purpose. 

The robot can move around, jump, and crouch. It has a mechanical saw in one arm which serves as melee weapon. On its back it has a small jetpack that can be used to dash forward.

It has to find his way out of the factory, dodging traps and obstacles and fighting enemies. There are puzzles and struggles to difficult its adventure.
